Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.tools

Class SceneFactory

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.tools.SceneFactory
public class SceneFactory extends Object
This is the helper class for building the world and pre character option view for the character chosen page.
It aims at code reusing and uses the Factory Pattern.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    m_Scene
    Player's choice for scene theme

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SceneFactory(String scene)
    This constructor gets the scene theme from the player and store it for later usage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    WorldBuilder
    getBuilder()
    This function returns the worldBuilder for the chosen theme in order to pass to the character option page.
    If the player's selection is 'General', the general worldBuilder will be returned.
    In the other conditions, the advanced worldBuilder will be returned for building image purposes.
    ArrayList<CharacterOptions>
    getCharacterOptions()
    This function returns the character image and paddle set for the chosen theme in order to pass it to the character option page.
    All the character images are set according to the themes.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • m_Scene

      private String m_Scene
      Player's choice for scene theme

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneFactory

      public SceneFactory(String scene)
      This constructor gets the scene theme from the player and store it for later usage.
      Parameters:
      scene - player's choice for scene theme passed from the scene option page

  • Method Details

    • getBuilder

      public WorldBuilder getBuilder()
      This function returns the worldBuilder for the chosen theme in order to pass to the character option page.
      If the player's selection is 'General', the general worldBuilder will be returned.
      In the other conditions, the advanced worldBuilder will be returned for building image purposes.
      Returns:
      the world builder of the specific type

    • getCharacterOptions

      public ArrayList<CharacterOptions> getCharacterOptions()
      This function returns the character image and paddle set for the chosen theme in order to pass it to the character option page.
      All the character images are set according to the themes. Different theme have different character image and its corresponding paddle set.
      Returns:
      character images and its corresponding paddle image of the specific type
